description.en-us: Gran Toros is an early line of 1/43 scale Hot Wheels manufactured by Mebetoys for Mattel from 1970 to 1973. The line was created by Mattel after acquiring Mebetoys and introduced to the American market in 1970 as a larger scale version of the standard Hot Wheels lineup; the line was given the name of Sputafuoco (lit. "fire-breathing") and Heisse Räder Supergroß (lit. "Hot Wheels Super Big") in Italy and Germany respectively.
